thread.title: Archer, Needville too much for Roughnecks
thread.title_full: Archer, Needville too much for Roughnecks

author: evan.dunbar@thefacts.com(evandunbar)
title: Archer, Needville too much for Roughnecks
text:
Archer, Needville too much for Roughnecks By EVAN DUNBAR evan.dunbar@thefacts.com The Facts | 0 comments 
WEST COLUMBIA — In a matchup that had all the makings for an offensive showcase, Friday’s District 12-4A showdown between the Columbia Roughnecks and the Needville Bluejays did not disappoint. 
The teams combined to score 89 points, with Needville (1-1, 4-3) earning the win, 55-34, to snap Columbia’s (1-1, 6-1) six-game win streak and hand the ’Necks their first loss of the season. kAm}665G:==6 BF2CE6C324< {@82? pC496C AFE 9:D D<:==D @? 5:DA=2J 282:?DE E96 ’}64<D[ 7:?:D9:?8 `c\@7\a_ A2DD:?8 7@C a`g J2C5D 2?5 EH@ E@F495@H?D 2?5 CF??:?8 7@C 2?@E96C `_b J2C5D 2?5 2?@E96C D4@C6 @? 6:89E 42CC:6D]k^Am kAmpC496C’D 3:886DE A=2J 42>6 @?
